name: Ga-unit-1
body:
GA-Unit-1 ========= About Me page About Margaret

About Me

I am a Marketing professional living in Toronto Canada. I became interested in Front-End Web Design and Development because I'd like to further my marketing skills within the web space.

My Mission

As I learn more about front-end, I hope to one day open my own agency working with global brands because I like to travel and work in a mobile environment.

My Experience

This is how I've evolved professionally:

  • Retail Marketing Manager, Samsung Electronics Canada
    Toronto ON, 2010-2014
  • 2010 Olympic Sports Marketing, Samsung Electronics Canada
    Vancouver BC, 2008-2010
  • Marketing Rep, Western Region. Sony Ericsson Canada
    Vancouver BC, 2006-2007

Education

Communications Diploma, Kwantlen University

Other

TESOL Certificate(Teaching English to Speakers of Other Languages)

If you're interested in collaborating with me on a project, feel free to email me at msysung@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
